name: Adam's quest
description:
Based off my new Tumblr comic series: Adam and friends comes this my first full screen platformer game! Adam is a well... An Adam, whos on a quest to prove himself worthy of being outside the test tube for a change!

It took me 2 weeks to make this game, may not have been a long time but making this game was a dang pain! I spent 2 hours finishing the game and stuff, and right now I'm as tired as heck! And don't even get me started about my back right now! Because it is killing me! :(

NOTE: I know the 2nd orange level is glitchy, but I actually attended it to be! It's so it will kind of confuse the player.

My Tumblr: https://team-m-bomb.tumblr.com/
